column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: 君は？
column4: Who are you?

column3: ここって？
column4: Where am I?

column3: さようなら
column4: Bye.

column3: ユン坊知らない？
column4: Do you know Yunobo?

column3: 組長が探してた
column4: Boss wants to know.

column3: ん？
column4: Hm?

column3: ま～だ用あるゥ～～？
column4: Soooo? Do ya neeeed somethin' else?!
Who, meeee?

column3: バイ バァ～～～イ
column4: Goooood-bye!

column3: ま～た キミかァ～～
column4: Oh. Yooou again.

column3:
ここはァ～～
北の廃坑って言ってェ～～
昔は「ドカンと火薬で発破して
 ガッツリ鉱石 ゲットだぜィ」
…の掛け声で有名な採掘場だったゴロよ～～

でも神獣 ヴァ・ルーダニアが現れてから
溶岩が増えて熱くなるわ魔物は増えるわで
危ないから もうここでは採掘してないゴロよ～
column4:
This is the Abandoned North Mine.
Oh, and this is the little ditty we all
used to siiiiing as we worked:
Ammo goes BOOM 'til ore fills the ROOM!
Gather said ORE for rupees GALORE!
Dig all the DAY to get the good PAY!
Yeah, this is a famous mine, my maaaan.
Or it was...until Divine Beast Vah Rudania
showed up. Now it's waaaay too hot!
There's tons more lava and all kiiiiiinds
of monsters out and about. It's so
dangerous, we can't dig here anymore!

column3:
あわあわあわ……
今日はァ～～人の出入りが多いィ～～
この先は もっともっと熱いし
魔物も沢山いるし危険ゴロよ！
column4:
Yeesh! What's goin' on today?!
So many peeeople out and about!

You should know it gets much hotter
past here, and there are also looots of
monsters. It's reeeally dangerous!

column3:
ユン坊ならァ～～ すごい勢いで
ゴロンシティの方にィ行ったゴロ～～
ルーダニアも あんななったし
組長に報告しに行ったのかなァ～～？
column4:
Yunobo? He went rushin' off to
Goron City... I think. Preeeetty sure.
All cuz of Rudania...
Maaaaybe he went to talk with Boss?

column3:
どーじで見ず知らずの人が
ユン坊の事知ってるゴロ～～？
column4:
Why's a stranger like yoooou askin'
about Yunobo?

column3:
ユン坊ならァ～～ すごい勢いで
オルディン橋の方にィ行ったゴロ～～
オルディン橋なら ここからさらに坂を～
ず～～っと登って～
ゴロン橋を渡って"ゴロン温泉を越えて
さらにさらに先へ進んだトコに あるゴロ～～
column4:
Yunobo went to the Bridge of Eldin...
I thiiiiink. Probably.

To get to Death Mountain Summit,
just keep going uuuuup this hill
aaaaall the way to the top!

column3:
ええ～！組長～～？！

そ…それなら ユン坊の居場所
教えないとねぇ～～
column4:
Huuuuh? Boss does?!


Well... Then I guess I better tell you
wheeeeere Yunobo is!

column3:
ユン坊ならァ～～
痛み止めを取りに行く って言って
あの保管庫の方に行ったけど
そういえばまだ戻って来ないゴロね
column4:
Yunobo...went to the vault to fetch some
painkillers. But now that ya mention it,
I suppooooose he never came back.

column3:
ここは危ないから
探しに行くのはやめといた方がいいと思うよ
column4:
This place is daaaaangerous, so ya
probably shouldn't go lookin' for him.

column3:
コ…コラ～！
それは組長の大砲ゴロ～～！！
レバーはぜったい触っちゃダメゴロよ！
column4:
HEY! Stooop that! That's Boss's cannon!
Don't you daaaare touch that lever!

column3:
あれェ～？
言わなかったっけェ～～？
column4: Huuuuh? Didn't I already teeeell you...

column3: ボ～グ～～ドリジャ～～～ン
column4: They call meeeee...Draaaaak!

column3:
神獣 ヴァ・ルーダニアが現れてから
溶岩が増えてね～
熱くなるわ魔物は増えるわで危ないから
ブルドー組長に この辺を見張るように
言われてるゴロ～～
column4:
Ever since Divine Beast Vah Rudania
showed up, there's a tooooon of lava.

It's waaaay too hot now, and there are
more monsters around too.

Boss keeps waaaatch over this area,
but he can only do sooo much...

column3:
ここは危ないから ブルドー組長に
「誰も通すな」って言われてるゴロ～～
column4:
This place is daaangerous, so Boss told
me not to let anyone through...
That means you tooooo, my maaaan.

column3:
ま いっか～～
じゃ もっかい言うゴロォ～～
column4: Well, OK. I'll tell you agaaaain.

column3:
キ…キミィ～～…
組長の大砲で遊ばないでェ～～
弾が飛んじゃうから
大砲に爆発物とか入れたら絶対にダメゴロよ！
column4:
HEEEY! YOOOOU!! Don't mess with
Boss's cannon!

You dooon't wanna send a cannonball
flyyyin', so don't even thiiiiink about
puttin' any explosives inside!

column3:
ユン坊なら
さっき急いでゴロンシティに戻ったゴロよ
column4:
If you're lookin' for Yunobo, he rushed
off earlier, baaaack to Goron City.
